item.description:
Being Your Creative Self

People are often unhappy if they can't be creative! It's important to have creative outlets in your life whether it's singing, dancing, mental creations, poetry, music, drama, sculpture, drawing, art, sports - the list is endless. Enliven your life and make new creations from your individual expression, feelings and intuitive spark. We will focus on the value of creativity, help clarify what you need to do to be more creative and we'll have lots of creative materials in the room to write songs, make a poster, sing, make up stories and allow your creative juices to flow.

7-10pm

$40, sliding scale to $20

Herb Pearce is an Enneagram teacher is 20 years experience, author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram (which you can purchase from him), and as a therapist and personal coach, works with individuals and couples in person and by phone to works with personality conflicts.

www.herbpearce.comwww.herbpearce.com
to see a description of all workshops and to receive my weekly email newsletter with Herb's life tips
item.name: Be Your Creative Self
